message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs.  I'm willing to part with it for $9,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I really love the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $7,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,500?  That's a fair offer considering how much you'll benefit from it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget.
